flawed_nl_solution:
Before the extra colored pencils, he had 150/5=<<150/5=30>>30 colored pencils in each container.
With the other colored pencils, he is given he now has 150+30=<<150+30=810>>810 colored pencils
If you distribute them evenly each container should have 810/5=<<810/5=162>>162 colored pencils
#### 162

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
